EmailTemplate.name: 2017_Global_Nurture_Jetwave_ATR.201706_Global_Email_Jetwave_ATR_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Give Your Passengers Wi-Fi That Actually Works ☺️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Wi-Fi Delivered at the Speed of Life <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdTVSkALisM]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Have you heard? "Wi-Fi that doesn’t suck" is now available! Honeywell has been showcasing what our global high-speed Wi-Fi technology can do. Here’s what reporters are saying:
The last place I expect to be able to make a video call is at 20,000 feet. <[[https://www.cnet.com/news/in-flight-wi-fi-fast-honeywell-connected-plane/]]>
If you’re frustrated by the slow internet connections you get while flying, here’s good news: New technology could soon bring much faster Wi-Fi to commercial planes. <[[http://www.today.com/video/watch-today-try-out-better-wi-fi-in-the-sky-live-at-25-000-feet-963763267922]]>
It was possible to stream YouTube and Netflix simultaneously while downloading a large file at 2MB — all without interruption. <[[https://skift.com/2017/06/02/honeywell-shows-off-connected-aircraft-capabilities-on-test-flights/]]>
Since nearly 3 of 4 passengers are ready to switch airlines today to have access to a faster and more reliable Wi-Fi connection – learn how your airline can be one that passengers stay loyal to with GX Aviation powered by JetWave™.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
